text: Arie Vos (born 12 February 1976) is a Dutch former motorcycle racer. He has competed in the Supersport World Championship from to and in , with a best finish of fifth at Assen in . ==Career statistics== ===Grand Prix motorcycle racing=== ====Races by year==== (key) (Races in bold indicate pole position) (Races in italics indicate fastest lap) {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" !
